definition: tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
to draw tight/to stretch taut/to tack (with thread or pin)/embroidery hoop/woven bed mat
to draw tight/to stretch taut/to tack (with thread or pin)/embroidery hoop/woven bed mat

sentences.english: The fat old man looked ridiculous in his tight pink trousers.
sentences.chinese: 那個胖老頭穿一條緊繃繃的粉紅色褲子，顯得很可笑。

sentences.english: His legs and buttocks had swollen so that they stretched his pants.
sentences.chinese: 大腿和屁股脹得很大，把褲子都撐得緊繃繃的。

sentences.english: He had a taut expression on his face, apparently very angry.
sentences.chinese: 他臉緊繃繃的，像很生氣的樣子。
